goal.tools.mc.property

Interface Property

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Automaton
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LTL2AUTProp

    public interface Property
extends Automaton
    Represents the property component of a model checker, which basically is a representation of an automaton (which is why this interface extends Automaton).
    Author:
    sungshik
